SCTX - Script Source:
scn mwBMStal03Script

begin onactivate
	SetStage fbmwBMEarth 30
	PlaySound3D 0BMSpipeSlarge
	if GetStage fbmwBMEarth >= 20
		if (fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber == 1)&&(fbmwBMEarth.answerright == 1)
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 2
		elseif (fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber == 1)&&(fbmwBMEarth.answerright == 3)
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 0
			set fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber to 2
		elseif (fbmwBMEarth.soundpuzzlenumber == 2)&&(fbmwBMEarth.answerright == 1)
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 2
		else
			set fbmwBMEarth.answerright to 0
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
